title: 1912 ATF ornaments
content:
I posted this a couple years ago on Typo-L with no responses.   
   
Does anyone know the originating foundry or designer of "Tabard Borders"   
which appear in (at least) the 1912 ATF type specimen book? They are rough   
(i.e. Koch or Preissig) organic cuts.
author: kegler
